messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

mail delivery failed to com sent wednesday re failed returning message tried send some requests got error original message sent wednesday failed returning message message was created automatically by software message you sent could be delivered one or more permanent error following address failed error remote server for rcpt command host cluster reason sorry your address blacklisted refer troubleshooting for more information header original message following with nemesis id for wed content type alternative boundary apple db message id mime version os re flight for el paso tx date wed references dc ca ad apple id out xx zee mw ye
